creator: ashishb
descriptionHtml:
A simple app that allows you to play songs stored in your Google Drive. You can stop worrying about transferring files manually from your computer to your smartphone.

To use this app, just move all your songs to a single folder of Google Drive (sub-folders are fine) and then let the app scan that folder.

- You don't have to worry about syncing. Just keep adding/removing songs in your Google Drive directory and you would be fine.
- The app has in-built smart caching to cache all the recently played songs up to a configurable cache. So, you don't have to worry about running out of disk space.
- The app automatically fetches the album art whenever available.
- (NEW) Ability to create playlists
- This is a cloud-based music player but can play local files as well
- Can work 100% offline

Note:

1. Google Drive is a trademark of Google. While this app uses Google Drive as a source of music, it is not affiliated with Google.
2. Some screenshots are pixelated since Google Play policies require that.
3. The app supports playing local files as well
4. The app supports Bluetooth headset controllers like pause/play buttons
descriptionShort: MusicSync is a Music Player that plays files directly from cloud storage

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Improve Bluetooth buttons and Android Auto support
- Improve error messages

title: MusicSync 🎵 music with cloud sync + offline play

creator: ashishb
descriptionHtml:
MusicSync is the best music player that puts you in control of your music, no matter where it's stored. Use it as an offline music player or link your Google Drive™ to seamlessly play all your music. It caches music from your cloud account for offline playback. The app is Chromecast-enabled. It supports hi-fidelity FLAC & ALAC lossless sound, gapless playback, Android Wear & Android Auto support. The app is completely free.

- You don't have to worry about syncing. Just keep adding/removing songs in your Google Drive directory
- Built-in smart caching. The app has in-built smart caching to cache all the recently played songs up to a configurable cache. So, you don't have to worry about running out of disk space. The app works 100% offline with cached songs.
- Connects to Modern Music Accessories. The app supports Bluetooth headset controllers like pause/play buttons. The app supports Android Auto™ as well as Chromecast™-enabled.
- Automatically fetches the album art and artist information whenever available.
- Custom and Auto-generated Playlists. You can create playlists. The app, just like Google Play Music, has auto-generated playlists like "Last Added" and "Most Frequently Played".
- The music continues playing even with the screen turned off.
- The app supports mp3, mp4/m4a/alac/aac, ogg, opus, wma, flac, wav, ape, wv, tta, mpc, aiff, dsd (dff/dsf), mka, mpga, tak, flv (audio)
- And best of all, it is free

Note:

1. Google Drive, Android Auto, and Chromecast are trademarks of Google. This app integrates with Google Drive, it is not affiliated with Google.
2. Some screenshots are pixelated since Google Play policies require that.
descriptionShort: Free music player that plays files from cloud and local storage

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Add single song play mode
- Fix a crash that happens if you change songs too quickly (10 times a second!!!) :/
- Improved UX - Increase batch download limit from 10 to 25 songs
- Add support for Google Cast
- Fix Google Drive token expiry
- Fix an ANR
- Add pull to refresh

title: MusicSync:cloud & offline play

creator: ashishb
descriptionHtml:
MusicSync is the best music player that puts you in control of your music, no matter where it's stored. Use it as an offline music player or link your Google Drive™ to seamlessly play all your music. It caches music from your cloud account for offline playback. The app is Chromecast-enabled. It supports hi-fidelity FLAC & ALAC lossless sound, gapless playback, Android Wear & Android Auto support. The app is completely free.



  • You don't have to worry about syncing. Just keep adding/removing songs in your Google Drive directory

  • Built-in smart caching. The app has in-built smart caching to cache all the recently played songs up to a configurable cache. So, you don't have to worry about running out of disk space. The app works 100% offline with cached songs.

  • Connects to Modern Music Accessories. The app supports Bluetooth headset controllers like pause/play buttons. The app supports Android Auto™ as well as Chromecast™-enabled
  • Automatically fetches the album art and artist information whenever available

  • Custom and Auto-generated Playlists: you can create playlists. The app, just like Google Play Music, has auto-generated playlists like "Last Added" and "Most Frequently Played".

  • The music continues playing even with the screen turned off

  • The app supports mp3, mp4/m4a/alac/aac, ogg, opus, wma, flac, wav, ape, wv, tta, mpc, aiff, dsd (dff/dsf), mka, mpga, tak, flv (audio)

  • Preserves last played location for audiobooks

  • Abilty to add audio files directly from URL

  • Ability to customize playback rate 0.25X - 2X

  • Best of all, it is free


  • Note:


    1. Google Drive, Android Auto, and Chromecast are trademarks of Google. This app integrates with Google Drive, it is not affiliated with Google.

    2. Some screenshots are pixelated since Google Play policies require that.

• Custom and Auto-generated Playlists: you can create playlists. The app, just like Google Play Music, has auto-generated playlists like "Last Added" and "Most Frequently Played".
• The media continues playing even with the screen turned off
• The app supports mp3, mp4/m4a/alac/aac, ogg, opus, wma, flac, wav, ape, wv, tta, mpc, aiff, dsd (dff/dsf), mka, mpga, tak, flv (audio)
• Preserves last played location for audiobooks
• Add audio files directly from URL
• Customize playback rate 0.25X - 3X (and even skip silence)
• Bookmark while playing audio books to take notes
• Best of all, it is free

Podcasts
• you can play the latest episodes from your favorite shows
• Subscribe and listen to all your favorite podcasts.
• Listen at faster playback speeds or skip over silences.
• Queue up episodes for a seamless listening experience.
• Easily keep track of your listening history, downloads and subscriptions.
• Stream episodes for instant playback or auto-download episodes to listen offline and on the go.
• Bookmark while playing podcasts to take notes

Note:

• Google Drive and Chromecast are trademarks of Google. This app integrates with Google Drive, it is not affiliated with Google.
• Some screenshots are pixelated since Google Play policies require that.

The premium version has some extra features:
• Ability to backup and restore playlists from Google Drive, as well as
• Add a home screen shortcut which is useful for listening to audiobooks
• Watch videos
